mapper.select: /* noticeDAO.studentNoticeDashList */ select a.notice_no , a.title , '' as class_no , b.hakwon_no , (select user_name from tb_user_info where a.reg_user_no = user_no) as write_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , (select hakwon_name from tb_hakwon where hakwon_no = a.notice_parent_no) as write_group , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '001' and content_parent_no = a.notice_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_notice a, tb_hakwon_member b where b.user_no = #{user_no} and a.notice_type = '002' and a.content_status = '001' and b.hakwon_no = a.notice_parent_no and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null) union select a.notice_no , a.title , b.class_no , b.hakwon_no , (select user_name from tb_user_info where a.reg_user_no = user_no) as write_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , (select class_title from tb_hakwon_class where class_no = a.notice_parent_no) as write_group , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '001' and content_parent_no = a.notice_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_notice a, tb_hakwon_class_student b where b.student_user_no = #{user_no} and a.notice_type = '003' and a.content_status = '001' and b.class_no = a.notice_parent_no and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null) order by reg_date desc limit 3

/* noticeDAO.parentNoticeDashList */ select a.notice_no , a.title , '' as class_no , b.hakwon_no , (select user_name from tb_user_info where a.reg_user_no = user_no) as write_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , (select hakwon_name from tb_hakwon where hakwon_no = a.notice_parent_no) as write_group , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '001' and content_parent_no = a.notice_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_notice a, tb_hakwon_member b where b.user_no = #{user_no} and a.notice_type = '002' and a.content_status = '001' and b.hakwon_no = a.notice_parent_no and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null) union select a.notice_no , a.title , b.class_no , b.hakwon_no , (select user_name from tb_user_info where a.reg_user_no = user_no) as write_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , (select class_title from tb_hakwon_class where class_no = a.notice_parent_no) as write_group , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '001' and content_parent_no = a.notice_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_notice a , tb_hakwon_class_student b , tb_student_parent c where c.parent_user_no = #{user_no} and c.student_user_no = b.student_user_no and a.notice_type = '003' and a.content_status = '001' and b.class_no = a.notice_parent_no and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null) order by reg_date desc limit 3

/* noticeDAO.noticeReqList */ select a.notice_no , a.notice_type , a.notice_parent_no , a.title , a.preview_content , a.reply_yn , a.reg_user_no , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as new_date , a.udp_user_no , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as udp_date , ( select group_concat(d.file_path SEPARATOR #{separatorChar}) from tb_file d where d.file_parent_no = a.notice_no and d.file_parent_type = '001' and d.file_use_yn = 'Y' and d.file_del_yn = 'N' and d.image_yn = 'Y') as file_path_array , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '001' and content_parent_no = a.notice_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_notice a where a.content_status = '001' and a.notice_parent_no = #{notice_parent_no} and a.notice_type = #{notice_type} and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null) order by a.reg_date desc , a.notice_no desc limit #{start_no}, #{page_scale}

/* noticeDAO.noticeDetail */ select a.notice_no , a.notice_type , a.notice_parent_no , a.title , a.preview_content , a.content , a.reply_yn , a.reg_user_no , b.user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as reg_date , a.udp_user_no , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i') as udp_date , a.is_file_view from tb_notice a , tb_user_info b where a.notice_no = #{notice_no} and a.content_status = '001' and a.reg_user_no = b.user_no and (a.reservation_yn = 'N' or a.reservation_send_date is not null)
